mapper.select: SELECT a.attention_id AS attentionId, a.user_id AS userId, a.attention_user_id AS attentionUserId, a.attention_status AS attentionStatus, m.user_name AS userName, m.user_icon AS userIcon from user_attention a left join user_msg m on a.attention_user_id = m.user_id where user_id = #{userId}
